string.name: plant_detail_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant details screen where the user can see the details for a specific plant.

string.name: gallery_title
string.translation_description: Title for the photo gallery screen

string.name: my_garden_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My garden' screen where the user can see the list of plants that have been added to their garden.

string.name: plant_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant list screen where the user can see a list of plants available to add to their garden.

string.name: garden_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My Garden' screen when no plants have been added to the user's garden

string.name: add_plant
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Plant List to add plants to their empty garden.
